titleStmt.title: His Majesties message to the Lord Generall Fairfax; and His act and proclamation concerning the army, to be published throughout all the respective counties, cities, and market towns, within the kingdom of England, and dominion of Wales. Also, a letter from the army to the King, and their new propositions touching his Majesty, and dissolving of the Parliament, and the time prefixed. With a declaration of the Lord Generall Fairfax touching the same. Agreed upon by his Excellency, and the councell of the army, and signed T. Fairfax.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: Contains "The demands of the army" addressed to Fairfax, "The armies message to the King", and a summary of the King's declaration to the army.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
